scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
scripts.dev: concurrently -n "BACKEND,SPL" -c "green,blue" "cd backend && npm run dev" "cd SPL && npm run dev"
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd SPL && npm install && npm install --save-dev @types/react-router-dom && cd ../backend && npm install && npx prisma generate
